attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: re-think the policy of not refunding road fund duty to motor traders, only the registerd vehicle keeper. MAKING IT MORE DIFFICULT FOR THE MOTOR TRADE TO OPERATE DURING THE TOUGHEST ECONOMIC CLIMATE FOR OVER 2 DECADES, WHEN THE PRIME MINISTER HAS ONLY PLEDGED HELP TO SMALL BUSINESS'S.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
